title: The mirror of architecture, or, The ground-rules of the art of building exactly laid down by Vincent Scamozzi ... ; reviewed and inlarged with the addition of a diagonal scale ... by Joachim Schuym of Amsterdam ; translated out of the Dutch by W.F. ; hereunto is added the description and use of an ordinary joynt-rule ... by John Browne.
author: Scamozzi, Vincenzo, 1552-1616.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for W. Fisher, and R. Mount ..., T. Passenger ..., and E. Smith ...,
